Tools & Guides for Chimeraland

A website dedicated to the Survival, Open World, Crafting MMORPG Chimerland..

New pages are being created every day and existing pages are being updated so you'll want to check back often.
Fox is a self-taught web developer and this is the first sizeable project. He is committed to researching and accurately sharing information to enhance your gaming experience.
Questions, feedback, comments?
Contact Fox at varefox@gmail.com or on Discord as Varefox #2568, or in game.

For work prepositions, contact me!

Creating guides and tools that you can use while gaming is more than just a hobby. You can support my work here.
Thank you!

Here's what's currently available

Tools

Pet/Attendant EXP Calculator

How to get the most out of your purity pills. This tool will tell you the exact amount of EXP needed for your mounts/attendants to get them to the desired level.

Recent update: It now tells you what level your pet will be if you give it n amount of pills.
